pattern.name: Compensate
pattern.problem: Software operation consumes electric energy. Now the carbon dioxide emission that is induced by the operation of the software shall be reduced.
pattern.solution: Reduce the share of consumed fossil energy by suitable compensation measures and assert these measures indeed will be implemented.
pattern.literature: Schmidt, B. (2019): Towards a Formal Language to Describe Sustainable Software Patterns. Bochum: University of Applied Sciences. Submitted paper.
